# NATO threatened? {#sec-nato-threat}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
NATO-Expansion threatened Russia, hence Russia had to protect itself by invading Ukraine
[<br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=nato%20%20threatens%20russia&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- NATO did not expand militarily to the East. 
- Russia fears Ukraine's EU membership: that economic prosperity in the neighboring country threatens the exploitation of the Russian population by the oligarchy.
:::
